archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0128
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product manager, I want to be able to offer a device discount to certain Interest Free customers, that is split over the period of their IF term, so that I can create a compelling offer

properties.value: Discount OOTB, how to determinate target group for the discount? Parked until the interest free sprint is done and more details are defined.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
